> Our question is, what is the newest version of JUnit we could upgrade to,
> without running into this issue?

You don't need to refactor your code but simply do a query-replace:

  assert(   becomes   assertTrue(

and your tests should have no other problems.  Otherwise the 3.7 version still
supports the assert(boolean) method.

-Vladimir
